backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the FUSION GEAR backend, implementing user profiles, customer profiles, service records, and invoice management with role-based access control via mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document summarizing four frontend source files: App.tsx, DashboardPage, CustomerProfilePage, and ServiceHistoryPage, describing their roles and recent fixes.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines light/dark theme CSS custom properties for colors, borders, charts, and sidebar.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the FUSION GEAR frontend app, mounting the React app into a root div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with all application routes (dashboard, customers, billing, invoices, history, login, profile setup) and wraps the app in ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AuthGuard.tsx: Authentication guard component that shows a loading spinner, login prompt, or profile setup modal depending on the user's Internet Identity authentication and profile state.
frontend/src/components/CustomerForm.tsx: Form component for creating or editing a customer profile, including fields for name, phone, address, bike details, and fuel level, with create/update mutations and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: App shell layout component providing a sticky header with logo, desktop/mobile navigation, and login/logout controls, wrapping page content in an AuthGuard.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that prompts newly authenticated users to enter their name and save their profile before accessing the app.
frontend/src/components/ThermalPrintSect: Renders a thermal receipt preview with 58mm/80mm paper width toggle, and provides copy-to-clipboard and browser print functionality for invoices.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppShareBut: Renders a WhatsApp share button that composes a formatted service invoice message and opens a wa.me link to send it to the customer's phone number.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login, logout, and identity persistence across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for CRUD operations on user profiles, customers, invoices, and service records against the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles including a dark mechanical theme with OKLCH CSS variables, Tailwind imports, and custom utility classes for amber accents and touch targets.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/CreateBillPage.tsx: Page component with a form for creating a new service invoice, supporting customer selection, service type checkboxes, cost inputs, GST toggle, and live billing calculation before submission.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerProfilePage.t: Displays a searchable list of customer profiles with options to add, edit, delete, and navigate to create a bill for each customer. Uses query hooks for data fetching and renders a form dialog for create/edit operations.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard page showing daily/monthly sales totals, pending invoices, service frequency stats, and quick-action links to create bills or view customers. Fetches data via multiple query hooks and displays loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/InvoiceViewPage.tsx: Displays a detailed view of a single invoice including customer info, services rendered, and payment status, with actions to mark as paid, download PDF, share via WhatsApp, or print thermally.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page for the FUSION GEAR app that authenticates users via Internet Identity, showing app features and redirecting to the dashboard upon successful login.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSetupPage.tsx: Simple page that centers and renders the ProfileSetupModal component for initial user profile configuration.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceHistoryPage.ts: Allows searching service history by bike registration number, displaying a sorted list of past invoices with expandable details for each record.
frontend/src/utils/billingCalculations.t: Provides utility functions for calculating billing totals (with GST, discounts, labour, and spare parts), formatting currency in INR, formatting nanosecond timestamps, and extracting service name labels from a service type object.
frontend/src/utils/escPosFormatter.ts: Formats invoice data into ESC/POS-compatible plain-text receipt layouts for both 58mm (32-char wide) and 80mm (48-char wide) thermal printers, including customer details, services, and cost breakdown.
frontend/src/utils/pdfGenerator.ts: Generates a branded HTML invoice for FUSION GEAR and triggers a browser print dialog to produce a PDF, including customer/bike details, service list, and cost totals.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for reading URL query parameters (supporting both standard and hash-based routing), persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, defining a dark mechanical theme with custom colors (garage, amber, whatsapp), custom fonts (Rajdhani, Inter), and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks the overall project state for FUSION GEAR, a bike garage billing Android app, including versioning, architectural notes, and a list of implemented features such as theming, customer profiles, billing, PDF generation, and Bluetooth printing.
